help.GoogleReCaptcha: Obtain the Site Key and Secret Key from [Google](https://www.google.com/recaptcha/).
help.Google:
**Obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials from the Google Developers Console.**

Visit [Google Developers Console](https://console.developers.google.com/project) to obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials such as a Client ID and Client Secret that are known to both Google and TPD-CRM application.
